question:
Which of the following states in India have tied up the global collaborative Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) movement?
  1. Maharashtra
  2. Uttar Pradesh
  3. Jharkhand
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation:
Since 2010, the SUN Movement has inspired a new way of working collaboratively to end malnutrition, in all its forms. In India, the SUN movement has tied up with Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh and Jharkhand to promote therapeutic food as a solution to malnourishment. The SUN Movement Secretariat is hosted by the United Nations Office for Project Services. The approach is organised around the four strategic objectives identified in the SUN Movement Strategy and Roadmap (2016-2020). These are:
  • Bringing people together
  • Coherent policy and legal framework
  • Aligning programs around a Common Results Framework
  • Financial tracking and resource mobilisation
